name: Bastard Pigeon
description:
###############

FREE NOW!

###############

Here it comes! The most exciting game in the App Store! Are you ready to face the challenge? Rocco the Pigeon came to the town.
A way too much peaceful town, isn’t it?
Help Rocco to shake it. Get vehicles and people dirty, but be careful not to miss targets, you’ll lose precious points.

Hurry up, you can get it at an introductory offer of just free, but only till the 21th of December 2012!!! :)

Game modalities:

* Tilt the device to move Rocco the Pigeon left or right. That * * way you will be able to skirt enemies or gain new shoot modalities.
* Tap on the screen to shoot enemies. But be careful, if you hit an enemy, you will score points, if you will miss it, instead, you will loose points.

Features:

* Flight control through accelerometer
* 10 difficulty levels
* 5 SPECIAL weapons
* Impressive sound effects (they will crak you up…!)
* Share your score on Facebook, Twitter, or by E-mail

Please, do not hesitate to send us any comment you think could be appropriate to improve the game, we will read you all. Write us to feedback@asasasoftware.com

A game success can be obtained also thanks to its users, thanks to all of you that will talk about Bastard Pigeon on your blog, on your Facebook page, on Twitter, to your family, at work… :D

Do you want to get latest news about updates, new games, or new applications by Asasa Software? Visit http://www.asasasoftware.com and subscribe to our newsletter for free. You will receive a mail only when updates will be available and no more then once at month.
